title: Client repeatedly crashing during champ select

replies.body: It sounds like you might be having a network issue that's causing you to lose sync with your group, and kicking you out.  First and foremost, I suggest removing any third party programs, as apps like play.tv are currently causing some players to crash during champion select.  You can then test this out in a custom game to prevent any further queue penalties.  If that doesn't resolve the issue, go through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to strengthen your connection and stay in game.  Let me know if you still have any issues!
